description: Detects Golden Chickens deployment method as used by Evilnum in report published in July 2020 Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: EvilNum Golden Chickens Deployment via OCX Files
query: (process.command_line:*regsvr32* AND process.command_line:*\/s* AND process.command_line:*\/i* AND process.command_line:*\\AppData\\Roaming\\* AND process.command_line:*.ocx*)
